title: Sites or plots identified by the Tourism Department of GoM
clause_text: Sites or plots identified by the Tourism Department of GoM. in consultation with the MTDC, and as specified by GoM from time to time as suitable for promotion of tourism to serve as holiday or beach resorts, hotels or motels may be included in a Tourism Development Area (TDA), and allowed to be developed for activities like beach resorts, hotels, motels, restaurants, health farms, water sports facilities, arts and crafts complexes, golf courses, gliding, powered gliding, grass skiing facilities, marinas, jetties and pontoons for docking of boats and swimming pools.
